resources.string: Tap on screen to restart the game

Hit the correct button based on moving gloves.
 Make sure to hit it when it is inside the frame to make combo punches.
 
 Your health will be decreasing slowly on every missed gloves and
 will decrease drastically if you hit wrong punch or in wrong time.
 Your health will increase on successful punch hit.
 
 Go ahead and boom the Sandbag .
